text: Ara niscaya'i amara tomara age rasulaganake pathiye diyechi, tamdera madhyera karo karo sanbandhe tomara kache amara bibrta karechi, ara tadera madhyera an'yadera sanbandhe amara tomara kache bibrta kari ni.
